title: Deals: Galaxy S22 sees $100 discount, HP Chromebase AiO $90 off, more
content:
All of today’s best deals include a $100 discount on Samsung’s new Galaxy S22. That’s alongside the HP Chromebase AiO with rotating 22-inch screen and Galaxy Tablet S7+ from $700. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.
